_sText:
de_favela_rio_dusk,night&dawn mappack

Now you can play de_favela_rio "from dusk till dawn".

This is a mappack with 3 new lighting versions of de_favela_rio.

de_favela_rio_dusk --> dusk version
de_favela_rio_night --> night version
de_favela_rio_dawn --> dawn version

The lay-out is exactly the same as already released de_favela_rio with day lighting.

The map plays songs that are not included in the BSP, and must be installed manually.

Instructions for installation of songs:

The mappack includes the folder de_favela, with 6 mp3 music files, to be installed in the folder ...cstrike/sound. If you wish, you can change the music files to your liking, just name them music1, music2... music6. To toggle songs, press use key (default <E>) in front of the stereo.

Note on the radar bug: If the radar does not appear, check the parameter cl_radaralpha, it must be set between 0 and 255 but by default is 1, which is almost Transparent. Adjust to 100 or more.

Note on the effect of vegetation fade-out: The vegetation of the map fades out at a certain distance. To eliminate this effect, change the parameter cl_detaildist 1200 (default) to 3000.

This is a video on the map:

<iframe width="560" height="315" src="http://www.youtube.com/embed/Bl53hkx2GPM" frameborder="0" allowfullscreen></iframe>

Have fun, and give me your feedback.
